original_title: The Analogues play The White Album
overview: After Magical Mystery Tour and Sgt. Pepper, The White Album is the third live rendition of a classic Beatles album by The Analogues. It will be released on CD, LP and finally on DVD!! When the original is so good, why go to all the trouble to re-record that music 50 years later? Van Poppel: "Well, we set ourselves the goal of playing the music that The Beatles never played live after 1966. We think of it as classical music that you can keep alive in this way. This experience is very intense if you have a live concert attends show, where the audience sees and feels all the special instruments and the 'analog craftsmanship' But on the recordings we can optimize the performance by a perfect balance in the mix; the live version of The White Album,
title: The Analogues play The White Album
